title: What's in a shadow?: Finding directions
creator_credit: Goldberg-Werrenrath Productions and Reinald Werrenrath Jr
brief_description: Shows the measurement of shadows throughout the day to determine the sun’s position and how to use this knowledge to find one’s direction. Also defines the earth’s relationship to the sun.
